summary: This is an email chain from November 2020 arranging an FBI visit to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) for Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney to review the contents of a laptop. It involves coordination between FBI agents and an Assistant United States Attorney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the inmate at MDC whose attorney is scheduled to review laptop contents with FBI agents present.

persons.name: Amanda Young
persons.context: She is the FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad, who is coordinating the visit and copied on the email.

connections.description: FBI Special Agent Amanda Young is involved in coordinating a visit related to the investigation of inmate Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: MDC Laptop Review Visit
events.description: A scheduled visit at the Metropolitan Detention Center for Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney to review the contents of a laptop, with FBI agents present to assist.

keyFacts: The email coordinates an FBI-facilitated visit for Ghislaine Maxwell and her attorney to review laptop contents while she is incarcerated at MDC in November 2020.
The visit was scheduled for a specific time window (9:15am â€“ 3pm) on November 6, 2020.
FBI Special Agent Amanda Young from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking squad in New York was involved in the coordination.
The email indicates procedural steps for FBI agents to follow upon arrival at MDC, including contacting MDC legal counsel if needed.
